name: bigquerydatapolicy
name_pretty: BigQuery Data Policy Service V1beta1 API
ruby-cloud-description: The Data Policy Service provides APIs for managing the BigQuery label-policy bindings. Note that google-cloud-bigquery-data_policies-v1beta1 is a version-specific client library. For most uses, we recommend installing the main client library google-cloud-bigquery-data_policies instead. See the readme for more details.
